        public static OverlapGraph simplifiedOverlapGraphFromGraphWithParameters(OverlapGraph graphToSimplitfy,
                                                         double epsilon,
                                                         int alpha)
        Simplifies the provided graph by removing transitive edges and merging reads into chunks. Note that the input Graph cannot contain reads that are contained by others in its readsInGraph field
        Parameters:
        graphToSimplitfy - Graph to simplify
        Returns:
        the simplified graph
